member.name: IMFStreamingSinkConfig.StartStreaming
member.summary: Called by the streaming media client before the Media Session starts streaming to specify the byte offset or the time offset.

param.name: fSeekOffsetIsByteOffset
param.code: A Boolean value that specifies whether qwSeekOffset gives a byte offset of a time offset.

listheader.description: The qwSeekOffset parameter specifies a byte offset.
The qwSeekOffset parameter specifies the time position in 100-nanosecond units.

member.param: A byte offset or a time offset, depending on the value passed in fSeekOffsetIsByteOffset. Time offsets are specified in 100-nanosecond units.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFStreamingSinkConfig
member.summary: Passes configuration information to the media sinks that are used for streaming the content. Optionally, this interface is supported by media sinks. The built-in ASF streaming media sink and the MP3 media sink implement this interface.
